meanings.definition: A synthetic steroid with antiandrogenic properties.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cyproterone to reduce the effects of male hormones.
meanings.sent2: She took cyproterone daily to help manage her condition.
meanings.sent3: The cyproterone pills were like tiny warriors fighting against unwanted hormones.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against excessive androgens, cyproterone stood as a powerful shield.
meanings.sent5: The image of cyproterone blocking the androgen receptors was etched in her mind.

meanings.definition: A medication used to treat prostate cancer and hirsutism.
meanings.sent1: After starting cyproterone, his prostate cancer symptoms improved.
meanings.sent2: The dermatologist recommended cyproterone to help with excessive hair growth.
meanings.sent3: The cyproterone pills were like magical potions for his health issues.
meanings.sent4: She saw cyproterone as a key to unlocking a better quality of life.
meanings.sent5: The transformation brought about by cyproterone was truly remarkable.
